articles.title: Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid before Grave of Ri Po Ik
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were laid before the grave of Ri Po Ik, grandmother of President Kim Il Sung, in Mangyongdae on Friday on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of her death.
					 Seen standing before the grave was a wreath sent by Kim Jong Un, first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea, first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission and supreme commander of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop and other senior officials, officials of the party, armed forces and power organs, working people's organizations, ministries and national institutions and other people in Pyongyang.
					
					 A wreath was laid before the grave in the name of the Central Committee of the WPK.
					
					 Also laid before the grave were wreaths in the name of working people's organizations, ministries, national institutions, military academies, scientific and media institutions and party and power bodies and farms in Pyongyang.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in memory of the noble life of Ri Po Ik, who ensured the steady continuity of the trait of the revolutionary family in Mangyongdae of loving the country, people and nation and devoted her all to the country and its people.

articles.title: Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK
articles.content:
Reception Given by Palestinian Ambassador to DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Palestinian Ambassador to the DPRK Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan gave a reception at his embassy on Friday on the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 Present there on invitation were Kang Sok Ju, member of the Political Bureau of the Central Committee of the WPK and vice-premier of the Cabinet, Kang Ha Guk, minister of Public Health, Thae Hyong Chol, president of Kim Il Sung University and concurrently minister of Higher Education of the Education Commission, Pak Kun Gwang, vice department director of the WPK Central Committee, Kim Hyong Jun, vice-minister of Foreign Affairs, and other officials concerned.
					
					 The ambassador said in a speech that the friendly relations between the two countries and peoples provided by Yasser Arafat and President Kim Il Sung are developing day by day thanks to the attention and care of President Mahmoud Abbas and Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 He expressed belief that the WPK would make great achievements in the efforts to build a thriving nation and accomplish the cause of national reunification under the leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Kang Sok Ju said in his speech at the reception that it is the steadfast stand of the WPK and the DPRK government to steadily boost the traditional relations of friendship between the two countries provided by Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il together with Yasser Arafat.
					
					 The DPRK will as ever extend full support and solidarity to the Palestinian government and people in their just cause of retaking their legitimate national rights including the right to build an independent state with East Kuds as its capital, he added.

articles.title: Anniversary of DPRK-Mongolia Diplomatic Relations Observed in Mongolia
articles.content:
Anniversary of DPRK-Mongolia Diplomatic Relations Observed in Mongolia
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Mongolian minister of Foreign Affairs and Trade hosted a reception on Tuesday on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the establishment of diplomatic relations between the DPRK and Mongolia.
					 Present there on invitation were DPRK ambassador to Mongolia and staff members of his embassy.
					
					 On hand were the vice chairman of the State Great Hural, minister of Culture, Sports and Tourism, minister of Industry and Agriculture, president of the Federation of Peace and Friendship Organizations of Mongolia and other figures.
					
					 Speeches were made there.

articles.title: DPRK-China Friendship Meeting of Youth Held in China
articles.content:
DPRK-China Friendship Meeting of Youth Held in China
 Dalian, October 17 (KCNA) -- A DPRK-China friendship meeting of youth was held at Dalian University of Technology of China on Thursday.
					 Present there were members of the DPRK youth friendship delegation led by Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League on a visit to China.
					
					 Staff and students of the university attended.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the DPRK-China friendly and cooperative relations provided and brought into bloom by President Kim Il Sung, General Secretary Kim Jong Il and Chinese revolutionaries of elder generations have long-standing historical roots and tradition.
					
					 They noted that the friendship and exchange between the youth of the DPRK and China grow stronger day by day amid the deep concern of the top leaders of the two countries.
					
					 Noting that the youth are flowers of the country and nation and proud masters of the future, they expressed the belief that the traditional DPRK-China relations of friendship would further develop by the common efforts of the youth of the two countries.
					
					 The meeting was followed by a performance given by the art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League and the young artistes of China.
					
					 The performance began with the immortal revolutionary hymn "Song of General Kim Il Sung" by the art squad. Female solo "Thinking of the General," Dance "Janggu Dance", instrumental ensemble "Let Youth Run like Express Train", mixed chorus "Our Leader Loved by the People", Chinese song "Red Flag Flutters High" and other numbers gave deep impressions to the audience.
					
					 Young Chinese artistes conspicuously decorated the stage with numbers like female solo "Beautiful Hometown" and Korean dance "Platycodon".
					
					 Warm sentiment of friendship between the youth of the two countries pervaded the meeting venue.

articles.title: DPRK Delegation Back Home
articles.content:
DPRK Delegation Back Home
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The DPRK delegation headed by Hong Kil Nam, vice-chairman of the North Phyongan Provincial People's Committee, returned home Thursday after taking part in the 2nd DPRK-China Economic, Trade, Cultural and Tourism Expo held in Dandong, China.
					 A briefing on the trade, investment and joint venture between the DPRK and China, a briefing on the economy and trade and a ceremony of signing contracts on joint ventures took place during the expo.

articles.title: WHO Delegation Leaves
articles.content:
WHO Delegation Leaves
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the World Health Organization (WHO) led by Samlee Plianbangchang, director of its Regional Office for South-East Asia, left here on Friday.

articles.title: Russian Orchestra Visits Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
articles.content:
Russian Orchestra Visits Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Orchestra of the 21st Century of Russia led by Pavel Ovsyannikov, head and chief conductor of the orchestra, visited the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War Museum here on Friday.
					 The guests paid tribute to the statue of President Kim Il Sung acknowledging the cheers of masses at the square where a military parade was held to celebrate the victory in the war.
					
					 They laid bouquets before sculpture "Victory", the Monument to the Victorious Fatherland Liberation War, and paid high tribute to the officers and men of the heroic Korean People's Army.
					
					 They went round various halls, being briefed on the undying leadership feats Kim Il Sung performed in winning a brilliant victory in defending the country and in the anti-imperialist struggle with his outstanding military wisdom, strategy and tactics and ardent patriotism and heroic fighting spirit displayed by the army and people of the DPRK during the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 At the end of the visit Pavel Ovsyannikov wrote in the visitor's book that the museum is a place which clearly shows the world people the great feats the Korean people performed in winning the victory in the war under the wise leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 Prior to it, the guests visited the International Friendship Exhibition House.

articles.title: Anniversary of Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Marked
articles.content:
Anniversary of Pyongyang Indoor Stadium Marked
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Pyongyang Indoor Stadium marked its 40th anniversary.
					 It is an edifice reflecting the WPK's love for people, which is associated with the leadership and glorious revolutionary history of the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung founded the stadium on April 3, Juche 62 (1973). It has been recently remodeled into a monumental edifice in the era of Songun.
					
					 Over the past 40 years the stadium has successfully discharged its honorable mission and duty as reliable sports and cultural base conducive to the development of the country's sports and the cultural and emotional life of the people and a grand political festival venue for ensuring important events of the party and the state.
					
					 A meeting marking the anniversary took place on Friday. 
					
					 A congratulatory message of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea was conveyed to the employees and officials of the stadium at the meeting.

articles.title: Premier Soccer Matches Go On in DPRK
articles.content:
Premier Soccer Matches Go On in DPRK
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Premier soccer matches are going on here as part of the DPRK Championships.
					 On Thursday, the Rimyongsu Team edged out the Wolmido Team 1:0 and the Amnokgang Team beat the Hwaebul Team 2:1 in the men's event.
					
					 In the women's event, the April 25 Team defeated the Ponghwasan Team 4:3, the Myohyangsan Team beat the Kalmaegi Team 3:1 and the Sobaeksu Team trounced the Chongchongang Team 3:1.
					
					 On Wednesday, the April 25 Team overpowered the Myohyangsan Team 5:0 and the Team of the Ministry of Light Industry drew with the Pyongyang Team at 1:1 in the men's event.
					
					 In the women's event, the Mangyongbong Team beat the Amnokgang Team 2:1 and the Rimyongsu Team defeated the Hwangryongsan Team 2:0.

articles.title: Educators Resolved to Repay WPK's Solicitude
articles.content:
Educators Resolved to Repay WPK's Solicitude
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Teachers and researchers of Kim Il Sung University have hardened their will to repay the solicitude of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) with educational and scientific achievements.
					 They were recently granted splendid flats, built near Ryonghung crossroads in Pyongyang under the deep care of the WPK.
					
					 Jang Hwa Sun, a staff of Law College of the University, told KCNA:
					
					 My husband, a researcher of the Material Science Faculty of the university, was honored to receive a luxurious house, which is far beyond my imagination.
					
					 I will bring up my children to be researchers like their father so as to repay the Party's loving care.
					
					 Pang To Il and his wife Pae Kwang Hui, who are holders of doctorate, said that they would do their best for the motherly Party, which has bestowed benefits one after another on them for their devoted service in scientific research. During their study at the university they developed the Korean translation program. After they got married, they completed the Korean grammar searching program and authored more than 30 pieces of papers, textbooks and reference books such as tele-education system.
					
					 Kim Tong Hui, a section chief of the Electronics and Automation Faculty who made contributions to streamlining production processes at various industrial establishments, said in tears:
					
					 Born in a mountainous village in Ryanggang Province, I could graduate Kim Il Sung University thanks to the popular policies of the Party and the state. This time the Party provided me with this flat as splendid as a palace.
					
					 It's my firm resolve to devote all my life to building a prosperous and powerful nation.
					
					 Ryu Myong Ho, a teacher of the College of Literature who wrote a well-known poem "I am a son of worker", and other teachers and researchers of the university who moved into new flats expressed their will to bring about a fresh turn in educating the rising generations and training scientific talents.

articles.title: Yun Won Chol of DPRK, World Wrestling Champion
articles.content:
Yun Won Chol of DPRK, World Wrestling Champion
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Yun Won Chol, a wrestler of the April 25 Sports Team in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, won the title in men's greco-roman 55 kg category in the 2013 World Wrestling Championship.
					 Yun began wrestling at Unjon County Juvenile Sports School in North Phyongan Province when he was 12 years old.
					
					 He started his career as a member of the April 25 Sports Team in Juche 94 (2005) and has since made good results in national and international tournaments.
					
					 From 2008, he has won gold medals in domestic tournaments including the Mangyongdae Prize Sports Games. And he proved successful in the international wrestling tournament "Dan Kolov-Nikolai Petrov" this year and the 2013 Asian Wrestling Championship.
					
					 Yun is now training hard to steadily improve his wrestling technique and skills. He told KCNA that he would display the dignity and honor of Songun Korea with more gold medals.

articles.title: KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Short-sighted Political View
articles.content:
KCNA Commentary Accuses Park Geun Hye of Her Short-sighted Political View
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- South Korean "president" Park Geun Hye is very poor in her insight.
					 During her recent Southeast Asian trip she uttered that "it is not desirable for the north to channel all national power into nuclear development" and "it is necessary to send an invariable message to the north so that it may dismantle its nukes."
					
					 Prior to this, she blustered that "south Korea would acquire as early as possible capability for coping with nukes and WMDs while maintaining strong south Korea-U.S. joint defense system so that the north may understand itself that its nukes and missiles are no more usable."
					
					 It seems that her basic political mode is aimed to disable the nukes of fellow countrymen in collusion with outsiders, though it is not so long since she came to power.
					
					 It should not go unnoticed that the most malignant mud-slinging she made at home and overseas was of the nukes of the north.
					
					 In a word, what she uttered is no more than a whole string of rigmaroles let loose by the traitor in a bid to disable the nukes of compatriots, a valuable treasure of the nation, with the help of foreign forces and a revelation of her short-sighted political view and ignorance.
					
					 It is shame on the nation for the U.S. stooge Park Geun Hye to say this or that about the DPRK's nuclear weapons of justice.
					
					 Park is now in such poor position that she cannot survive even a day without staking her fate as a politician on outsiders and regarding her American master as her husband. Does she know anything about the noble mission of the DPRK's nukes for self-defence as she is so busy decrying them?
					
					 The treasured nuclear sword of the DPRK is a means for defending itself from aggressors' nuclear threat.
					
					 In order to protect the sovereignty and vital rights of the nation and the supreme interests of the country its army and people had access to diversified precision nuclear deterrence by tightening their belts.
					
					 The validity of the DPRK's choice has been proved day by day in the world where the jungle law prevails and by the geopolitical situation on the Korean Peninsula where the U.S. and other aggressors are waiting for a change to invade the DPRK.
					
					 But for the treasured nuclear sword for the compatriots, the north and the south of Korea would not have been able to escape a war disaster, much less Park's assumption of office as "president."
					
					 To cry out for the DPRK's dismantlement of nukes in utter disregard of this stark fact is something that can be done only by the idiots who are utterly unable to judge what is going in actuality.
					
					 The more eagerly the Park's group begs foreign forces to pressurize the north to drop its treasured sword for defending the nation, the more glaringly it will reveal the true colors of the group as top-class nuclear war servants of the U.S. bereft of elementary reason and judgment and colonial lackeys.
					
					 Pitiful, indeed, is the plight of the puppet group which prolongs its political career by clinging to coattails of outsiders.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Eternal Leaders of Korean People
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Lauds Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il as Eternal Leaders of Korean People
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il are the greatest men who cannot be called otherwise than the sun and great revolutionaries and peerlessly political elders representing the 20th century and steering the 21st century, says Rodong Sinmun Friday in an article.
					 Their revolutionary history is the glorious one of the great sun of Juche and Songun, the articles notes, and goes on:
					
					 They enjoy immortality as the sun of Juche because the revolutionary ideas founded by them are great.
					
					 Their ideas and theories are shining as a treasured sword to be held fast to forever. They include the philosophical principle of Juche, idea of transforming man and remaking society and nature, theory on the anti-imperialist and anti-feudal democratic revolution and socialist revolution, theory on revolutionary leadership, method of guiding the masses, line on carrying out the three revolutions, ideological, technical and cultural and idea of achieving global independence guided by the tenet of independence, peace and friendship.
					
					 Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il are always alive as the sun of Juche for the immortal exploits performed by them on behalf of the country, revolution, era and history. 
					
					 The party, state, army and Korean style socialism centered on the popular masses founded, strengthened and developed by them serve as treasures of Songun Korea which are most powerful in the world.
					
					 Under their wise leadership the a small and weak nation once exploited and oppressed, emerged a standard-bearer steering the trend of the times, tightly holding its destiny, and achieved the unbreakable single-minded unity of the leader, party and masses and ushered in the great heyday of national prosperity.
					
					 The DPRK will always remain shining as a country of the eternal sun thanks to the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un ushering in a new era of prosperity, holding fast to the revolutionary ideas of the great Generalissimos, the article concludes.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms U.S. Worst Human Rights Abuser
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Shortly ago, the archives of official documents on national security at George Washington University opened to public the fact that the U.S. National Security Agency tapped conversations of various anti-war activists in the U.S. in the 1970s.
					 Rodong Sinmun Friday observes in a commentary in this regard:
					
					 This fact goes to clearly prove that the U.S. eavesdropping and surveillance didn't start at the outset of the new century.
					
					 The U.S. intelligence services claim that they conducted tapping and surveillance in a bid to "combat terrorism" in the wake of the occurrence of the Snowden case but this is nothing but a hypocritical pretext, the commentary notes and goes on:
					
					 Under the patronage of the ruling forces the intelligence services in the U.S. stealthily conducted tapping and surveillance of those anti-war activists, abusing their human rights. This fact clearly indicates that the U.S. is the worst human rights abuser and the most horrible tundra of democracy.
					
					 The U.S. is a criminal state which has neither qualification nor face to take issue with human rights performance, democracy and freedom in other countries.
					
					 Entering the present century the world has already branded the U.S. as the worst human rights abuser as it committed shuddering torture in the jail of its naval base in Guantanamo and Abu Ghraib prison in Iraq and secret jails in European countries.
					
					 Great irony is that the U.S. is still behaving as if it were "human rights judge" though it has neither qualification nor face to talk about human rights, democracy and freedom.
					
					 The U.S. ruling forces would be well advised to stop groundlessly finding fault with other countries but set right their wrong way of thinking.

articles.title: S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Standing against Era and People's Mindset
articles.content:
S. Korean Puppet Regime Accused of Standing against Era and People's Mindset
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The south Korean puppet regime's act of escalating confrontation with fellow countrymen is an anti-reunification racket, quite contrary to the aspiration of all Koreans to usher in a new phase of national reconciliation and unity by mending inter-Korean relations. It is also a heinous treacherous crime to quell the ardent desire of the Korean nation for peace of the country and its peaceful reunification. Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in an article.
					 The north and the south of Korea are the homogeneous nation with one and the same blood vessel, so the basic mode of settling the issue should be dialogue and negotiations, the article says, and goes on:
					
					 The Korean nation is aspiring after peace and peaceful reunification more than any others as it has been subject to constant danger of war, being divided into two parts at the hands of foreign forces. In order to defuse tensions on the Korean Peninsula and achieve peace there, it is necessary to put an end to the racket for escalating military confrontation against fellow countrymen in south Korea.
					
					 But the Korean nation's aspiration for peace is ruthlessly violated by the belligerent ambition of the south Korean puppet forces.
					
					 The U.S. and the puppet warmongers have staged the frantic and provocative war maneuvers pursuant to the "tailored deterrence strategy" to mount a surprise preemptive nuclear attack on the DPRK. The danger of a nuclear war on the peninsula is increasing to the extremes as the south Korean puppet forces have crafted the "tailored deterrence strategy" together with the U.S. and are applying it to the anti-DPRK joint military exercises under various codenames. They are unhesitatingly quenching the aspiration of the nation in disregard of the trend of the times for the sake of their ambition for escalating confrontation with the DPRK. Such reckless criminal racket is again plunging the inter-Korean relations into a deadlock and seriously threatening the peace and security on the peninsula.
					
					 All facts prove that they are wantonly quelling the aspiration and desire of all Koreans for improving the inter-Korean relations and achieving the reunification of the country while going against the trend of the times.
					
					 They should clearly understand that in case they go against the era and people's mindset, they will meet a miserable end.

articles.title: Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Minister of Unification Denounced
articles.content:
Reckless Remarks of S. Korean Minister of Unification Denounced
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Ryu Kil Jae, puppet minister of Unification of south Korea, at a recent hearing on an "inspection of state administration" at the Committee of Foreign Affairs and Unification of the "National Assembly" talked rubbish that the north's "ceaseless nuclear development and endless criticism are chilling the south-north relations." He, at the same time, let loose such rhetoric as "door of dialogue" and "confidence through dialogue and cooperation". He was so impudent as to urge the north to take "a right option", ballyhooing about "genuine way of development" and "way for the future of the nation". 
					 Leading newspapers on Friday brand in their commentaries the reckless remarks as a cynical ploy to evade the responsibility for the bedeviled north-south relations and tensions escalating on the Korean Peninsula and mislead the public opinion in a bid to pursue the confrontation policy at any cost. 
					
					 Rodong Sinmun says it is the height of shamelessness for Ryu to grumble about "nuclear development" and the like in an attempt to shift the responsibility for the strained inter-Korean relations onto the DPRK.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations which have reached such a deplorable phase are attributable to the present south Korean ruling quarters' persistent pursuance of their confrontation policy defying unanimous denunciation at home and abroad. The case is same with Ryu's complaint about "endless criticism." The backbiting of Ryu only revealed his ignorance at home and abroad as he cannot properly judge the cause and consequences of undesirable phenomena. 
					
					 He talked as if he would do something for mending the inter-Korean relations with a forced smile on his face, speaking volumes about "door of dialogue" and "cooperation." Is he entitled to utter something about dialogue and cooperation as he is blinded with the moves to realize the ambition for confrontation? It is really disgusting to hear the puppet group talk such rubbish. 
					
					 Minju Joson says:  "Genuine development" and "future of the nation" touted by Ryu Kil Jae, impudently advising the north "to make a right option", provoke a side-splitting laughter.

articles.title: Another Pusan-Masan Resistance in S. Korea Called for
articles.content:
Another Pusan-Masan Resistance in S. Korea Called for
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The current south Korean regime reminds everyone of the "Yusin" dictatorship.
					 It is illustrated by the fact that the south Korean chief executive, Park Geun Hye, a descendant of "Yusin" dictator Park Chung Hee, has engineered cooking up all sorts of plots to find excuses to suppress the progressives in south Korea.
					
					 A number of hardcore members of progressive organizations, including the South Headquarters of the Pan-National Alliance for Korea's Reunification, the Solidarity for Implementing the North-South Joint Declaration and the People for Achieving Peace and Reunification, have been put behind bars, labeled as "forces following the north" and "enemy-benefiting organization".
					
					 Not content with praising her father's "feats", she went to the lengths of decrying the south Korean people's struggle for democracy, while running amuck to crack down upon opposition parties.
					
					 The inter-Korean relations, which began going towards improvement thanks to the DPRK's positive initiatives and sincere efforts, have worsened due to her persistent moves to revive "Yusin" dictatorship.
					
					 The moves lay a big hurdle in the way for attaining the independent national reunification.
					
					 The representative of a south Korean opposition party said Park Guen Hye's politics reminds one of "Yusin" dictatorship, calling for launching the 2nd Pusan-Masan Resistance which rocked to the bottom the "Yusin" dictatorship in October 1979. 
					
					 The south Korean newspaper Hangyore in an article titled "Disclose the Nature of 'Yusin'" said: 
					
					 "Park Geun Hye is beautifying Park Chung Hee's coup d' etat and 'Yusin' as 'national salvation' and 'decision', but the words 'national salvation' are not enough to cover up the innumerable crimes her father committed."

articles.title: S. Korean Regime Slammed for Its Move to Join in U.S. MD
articles.content:
S. Korean Regime Slammed for Its Move to Join in U.S. MD
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The People for Achieving Peace and Reunification of south Korea held a press conference in front of the puppet Defense Ministry on Wednesday to denounce the conservative group for its sinister intention to join in the U.S. missile defense system (MD).
					 At the press conference speakers accused the military authorities of claiming that the introduction of SM-3 and medium and high-altitude missile system does not mean that south Korea is joining in the U.S. MD. But in actuality it means that south Korea will come itself under a low-level MD, they noted.
					
					 Clear is the fact that in case the authorities introduce a new missile shield, everything including missile operations and systems will be put under the control of the U.S. forces, they held.
					
					 They urged the authorities to stop at once the moves to join in the MD.

articles.title: Japan's Attempt to Repeat Past War Crimes Slammed
articles.content:
Japan's Attempt to Repeat Past War Crimes Slammed
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Council for the Solution of the Issue of the Volunteers Corps and the People's Action against War and for Realizing Peace in south Korea held the 1096th Wednesday rally in front of the Japanese embassy in Seoul on October 16 in protest against Japan's moves for reinvasion.
					 The speakers at the rally said that Japan is attempting to let its "Self-Defense Forces" advance overseas under the pretext of contingency on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The Koreans can never tolerate Japan's moves to realize its scenario for reinvasion by promoting the legalization of the "right to collective self-defense", they added.
					
					 A statement was read out at the rally.
					
					 It denounced the Japanese government for shunning an apology and reparation for the past crimes and concealing and distorting the history of aggression.
					
					 The U.S. backs such moves of Japan and south Korea keeps pace with them, it noted.
					
					 The south Korean authorities, in particular, are taking the lead in the moves to embellish the crimes committed by the Japanese imperialists, a serious crime, the statement said, demanding them stop such act at once.
					
					 It urged the Japanese authorities to reflect on their past crimes and rescind at once their scenario for overseas aggression.

articles.title: S. Korean Resident Praises DPRK at Court
articles.content:
S. Korean Resident Praises DPRK at Court
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A south Korean resident shouted a slogan praising the DPRK at the puppet court on Wednesday, sending shiver down the spines of the fascists, according to south Korean Yonhap News.
					 That day the puppet Chongju District Court held again a trial of the resident whom it charged with the violation of the "Security Law" several times.
					
					 The fascist authorities arrested and took actions against him in May 2011 by invoking the evil law, charging that he posted on his website dozens of articles praising the DPRK from July 2009 to March 2011.
					
					 When they delivered unreasonable verdicts at the first, second and two other trials, he insisted on the validity of his activities, chanting "Long Live the Democratic People's Republic of Korea!"
					
					 This time the court sentenced him to one year and six months of prison term as it did at the original trial, claiming that he posted on website articles praising the north in the past and chanted the slogan several times at trials only to increase the danger of his crimes.
					
					 After the judgment was read out, he chanted again "Long Live the great DPRK!"

articles.title: S. Korean Conservative Group's Policy of Confrontation Censured
articles.content:
S. Korean Conservative Group's Policy of Confrontation Censured
 Tokyo, October 17 (KNS-KCNA) -- A seminar on the situation for reunification on the theme of "We lay bare hypocritical 'confidence-building process on Korean Peninsula' and 'theory of principle'" was held at the Korean Press Hall in Tokyo on Wednesday. It was sponsored by the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan and the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification.
					 Present there were Nam Sung U, vice-chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), Han Tong Song, director of the Information and Cultural Department, So Chung On, director of the International Affairs and Reunification Department, Kim Hwa Hyo, chairman of the Korean Social Scientists Association in Japan,  Ri Tong Je, chairman of the Association of Koreans in Japan for Peaceful Reunification, and other officials of Chongryon and compatriots.
					
					 Speakers said that the moves of Park Geun Hye and the conservative group of south Korea to escalate confrontation with the DPRK have reached an intolerable phase.
					
					 It is the Park's group which is driving the inter-Korean relations into a catastrophe again though they had been put on the orbit of dialogue thanks to the sincere efforts of the DPRK, they charged.
					
					 They condemned the puppet group's malignant mud-slinging at the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and its social system as the worst act of treachery.
					
					 The "collapse of the north", "confidence-building process on the Korean Peninsula" and "the theory of principle" touted by the Park group are the heinous policies of confrontation challenging the aspiration of the fellow countrymen for reunification, and the "second principal plan for the development of the south-north relations" which specified them is an anti-reunification document aimed at totally scrapping the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration, they noted.
					
					 They urged the Park group to stop at once the treacherous act of chilling the aspiration of the nation and stemming the trend of the times and moves against national reunification. -0- 
					
					 They said that all the officials of Chongryon and compatriots will turn out as one in the nationwide struggle to expose the moves of the south Korean conservative group for escalating confrontation and thoroughly preserve and implement the June 15 joint declaration and the October 4 declaration by the concerted efforts of the whole nation, bearing in mind the conviction that the cause of national reunification will be realized without fail as it is led by Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted by Swiss Organization on Its Website
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- General Secretary Kim Jong Il's work "The Workers' Party of Korea Is the Party of the Great Leader Comrade Kim Il Sung" was posted by the Switzerland-Korea Committee on its website on October 9.
					 The work published on October 2, Juche 84 (1995) is a great programme for party building and activities as it reviews with pride the glorious history of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) in which it explored a new way of building a revolutionary party in the era of independence under the leadership of President Kim Il Sung and indicates the way for developing the WPK into an eternal party of Kim Il Sung.

articles.title: Kimjongilia Show Opened in Russia
articles.content:
Kimjongilia Show Opened in Russia
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- A Kimjongilia show opened in Vladivostok on October 11 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 Displayed in the venue of the show against the background of the large-size electronic picture depicting Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia were Kimjongilia flowers in full bloom and books about the flower presented to international flower shows.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony of the show were figures of political and public circles and military and masses in the Maritime Territory and Vladivostok City.
					
					 The first secretary of the Maritime Territorial Regional Committee of the Communist Party of the Russian Federation said:
					
					 Kimjongilia is an immortal flower reflecting the unbounded reverence of progressive mankind for General Secretary Kim Jong Il, eternal general secretary of the WPK.
					
					 Kim Jong Il was a peerlessly great man who made a great contribution to the Korean revolution and the accomplishment of the global cause of independence.
					
					 The socialist cause and the Songun revolutionary cause in the DPRK are sure to triumph as supreme leader Kim Jong Un is successfully carrying forward his cause. 
					
					 The manager of the Pushkin Theatre said that he was enchanted by Kimjongilia out of his profound reverence for the peerlessly great man who turned the DPRK into a socialist country centred on the popular masses.
					
					 A commanding officer of the Pacific Fleet of Russia noted that Kimjongilia would be in full bloom all over the world for the exploits Kim Jong Il performed in the Far Eastern Region of Russia, adding that there are many beautiful flowers in the world but the flower which goes by the august name of the leader is found in the DPRK only.

articles.title: DPRK's Important Days in October Marked Abroad
articles.content:
DPRK's Important Days in October Marked Abroad
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Events took place in Myanmar, Norway and Bulgaria on October 8 to mark the 16th anniversary of General Secretary Kim Jong Il's election as general secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK), the 68th anniversary of the WPK and the 87th anniversary of the formation of the Down-with-Imperialism Union (DIU).
					 The events included meeting, photo exhibition and film show.
					
					 Displayed in the venues of the events were photos documenting immortal exploits President Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il performed in party building and supreme leader Kim Jong Un in the Songun revolutionary leadership.
					
					 Participants of the film show watched a Korean film on the significant celebration of the 60th anniversary of the great victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.
					
					 A member of the Executive Committee of the Yangon Regional Committee of the Union Solidarity and Development Party of Myanmar said that the WPK has advanced along the road of shinning victory under the outstanding leadership of the great leaders for nearly seven decades since its founding.
					
					 The WPK has achieved the single-minded unity of the leader, the party and masses, something rare to be found in other countries, and is performing its duty as the mother party deeply rooted among the people, he added.
					
					 The chairman of the Ostfold County Committee of the Communist Party of Norway recalled that the WPK founded by Kim Il Sung has led the Korean revolution to victory and glory.
					
					 Speakers including the acting chief of the Kim Il Sung Library in Sofia, Bulgaria recalled that Kim Il Sung gave origin to the founding of a revolutionary party by forming the DIU and provided an organizational and ideological groundwork for founding the party in the crucible of the anti-Japanese struggle and Kim Jong Il steadily developed the WPK into the party of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 A message of greeting to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting held in Bulgaria.

articles.title: Anniversary of WPK Observed by Foreign Newspapers
articles.content:
Anniversary of WPK Observed by Foreign Newspapers
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- Foreign newspapers dedicated special write-ups to the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The October 8 issue of the Uruguayan newspaper La Juventud carried an article titled "Great leader of mother party" illustrated with a photo of Marshal Kim Jong Un among members of the Children's Union.
					
					 The paper said that the WPK is being praised by the people as a mother party, adding:
					
					 Kim Jong Un's love for the people is a starting point of all his thinking and activities and the greatest principle and goal of his politics.
					
					 It is the political philosophy and motto in his life that there are a leader and officials to serve the people and it is necessary to solve all issues arising in the revolution by trusting the people, masters of the revolution and construction, and relying on them.
					
					 Kim Jong Un calls upon the officials to give top priority to the interests of the people and make them absolute and work harder to serve them.
					
					 It is Kim Jong Un who has photos taken with ordinary people and soldiers arms in arms and shoulder to shoulder without any formality everywhere he visits.
					
					 The WPK will always emerge victorious thanks to the unequivocal support and trust of the popular masses as a mother party having Kim Jong Un as its first secretary.
					
					 The Bangladeshi newspaper Daily Folk, the Pakistani newspaper Baluchistan Times and the Nepalese newspaper Nepal Today carried articles titled "Founder of WPK", "Mother party and Kim Jong Il" and "Source of sure victory of WPK" in the period from October 6 to 10.
					
					 The articles praised the immortal exploits performed by President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il in party building and the wise leadership of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The October 1-15 issue of the Bulgarian newspaper Novo Rabotnichesko Delo referred to the fact that the Korean people enjoy happiness thanks to the popular policies of the party and the state.

articles.title: WPK's Anniversary Marked by Russian Political Parties
articles.content:
WPK's Anniversary Marked by Russian Political Parties
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Russian political parties posted special write-ups on their websites on October 9 to mark the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The All-Union Communist Party of Bolsheviks posted an article titled "The DPRK greeting October 10, the 68th anniversary of the WPK" illustrated with a photo documenting the revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and a picture of the Monument to Party Founding.
					
					 The article said that the WPK has its historic roots in the Down-with-Imperialism Union formed by Kim Il Sung on October 17, 1926.
					
					 It went on:
					
					 The WPK goes by the august name of Kim Il Sung as he performed great exploits by founding and developing it.
					
					 The Korean people defeated the boss of imperialism by displaying matchless bravery and patriotism in the great Fatherland Liberation War fought to beat back the U.S. imperialists' invasion under the leadership of the party.
					
					 They waged a heroic struggle for building a socialist state under hard conditions after the war.
					
					 The single-minded unity of the DPRK grew stronger thanks to the Songun politics of General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The WPK firmly defended socialism centered on the popular masses, weathering all trials, remaining true to the behests of Kim Il Sung under the leadership of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 The "Communists of Russia" Party edited an article introducing the glorious history of the WPK achieving victory only thanks to the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Foreign Broadcasting Services Air Programs on WPK's Birthday
articles.content:
Foreign Broadcasting Services Air Programs on WPK's Birthday
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- TV and radio broadcasting services of various countries aired programs to observe the 68th anniversary of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK).
					 The Central TV of Syria on Oct. 10 aired a program showing revolutionary activities of President Kim Il Sung and General Secretary Kim Jong Il.
					
					 It said that the WPK always advanced along the road of victory and glory, performing world-startling miracles, in the past under their wise leadership.
					
					 Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il developed the party into an invincible one and turned the DPRK into a socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in the economy and self-reliant in national defense, it noted.
					
					 The feats they performed by devoting all their lives to national reunification and the cause of global independence will always be remembered not only by the Korean people but  by  progressive mankind, it stressed.
					
					 Marshal Kim Jong Un is the greatest leader in the present times as he is successfully carrying forward the cause of the preceding leaders and developing the DPRK, it said.
					
					 The Central Radio of Syria introduced the glorious history of the WPK under the title "On the occasion of the 68th anniversary of the WPK" on the same day.
					
					 F.M.90.5 Radio of Cambodia on Oct. 2 reported that world-startling miracles are being wrought in the DPRK through the campaign for creating the "speed on Masik Pass".
					
					 The State Radio of Equatorial Guinea and the Guinean domestic and international radios and radio of seven national languages aired programs on Oct. 10 highly praising the undying feats performed by Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il in founding and leading the party and Kim Jong Un's noble personality of loving the people.

articles.title: October 4 Declaration Supported by Nepali Organizations
articles.content:
October 4 Declaration Supported by Nepali Organizations
 Pyongyang, October 18 (KCNA) -- The Nepali Committee for Promotion of Reunification of Korea and the Nepali Association for Supporting the Songun Politics issued a joint statement on October 8 to mark the 6th anniversary of the October 4 declaration.
					 The statement said a bright vista for realizing the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea was opened with the publication of the historic declaration, expressing belief that all the Korean people in the north and the south and abroad would certainly achieve the country's reunification in firm unity under the wise leadership of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 It urged the south Korean authorities to immediately stop the war exercises to invade the north, drive the GIs out of south Korea and bring down the concrete wall.
					
					 The south Korean authorities' smear campaign against the DPRK getting all the more vicious as the days go by is a reckless provocation against its people in their efforts to firmly defend the idea and cause of their leader and the sovereignty and dignity of the country, the statement said.
					
					 It stressed that they were sending full support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for achieving the country's reunification in an independent and peaceful way in the idea of "By our nation itself".

articles.title: Rinden tributo a Ri Po Ik en el dia de su fallecimiento
articles.content:
Rinden tributo a Ri Po Ik en el dia de su fallecimiento
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 54o aniversario del fallecimiento de la ferviente patriota Ri Po Ik, tuvo lugar una ceremonia de homenaje ante su tumba en Mangyongdae.
					Alli estaba colocada una ofrenda floral enviada por el Mariscal Kim Jong Un, Primer Secretario del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, Primer Presidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea.
					
					En la ocasion participaron Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop y otros cuadros, funcionarios de los organismos del partido, las fuerzas armadas y el poder, entidades de masas, ministerios y organos centrales junto con trabajadores capitalinos.
					
					Ante la tumba fueron depositadas una ofrenda floral en nombre del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y las otras en nombre de las entidades de masas, ministerios, organos centrales, academias militares, instituciones de ciencia y prensa, organismos del partido y el poder y granjas en esta capital.
					
					Los participantes guardaron un momento de silencio recordando la noble vida de Ri Po Ik quien dio firme continuidad a la tradicion patriotica de los familiares revolucionarios de Mangyongdae y dedico todo lo suyo a la patria y al pueblo.

articles.title: Regresa a Pyongyang delegacion de RPDC
articles.content:
Regresa a Pyongyang delegacion de RPDC 
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Regreso aqui el dia 17 en tren la delegacion coreana encabezada por Hong Kil Nam, vicepresidente del Comite Popular de la Provincia de Phyong-an del Norte, tras participar en la II Exposicion Economica, Comercial, Cultural y Turistica Corea-China efectuada en Dandong de China. 
					En el periodo de la exposicion tuvieron lugar la reunion explicativa sobre el comercio, inversion y colaboracion entre Corea y China, la de comercio y economia y la ceremonia de firma de contrato de cooperacion.

articles.title: Embajador palestino ofrece banquete por el dia de fundacion del PTC
articles.content:
Embajador palestino ofrece banquete por el dia de fundacion del PTC
Pyongyang, 18 de octubre (ACNC) -- Con motivo del 68o aniversario de la fundacion del Partido del Trabajo de Corea, el embajador del Estado de Palestina acreditado en Corea, Ismail Ahmed Mohamed Hasan, ofrecio el dia 18 un banquete en su sede diplomatica.
					A la recepcion fueron invitados Kang Sok Ju, miembro del Buro Politico del Comite Central del PTC y vicepremier, Kang Ha Guk, ministro de Salud Publica, Thae Hyong Chol, rector de la Universidad Kim Il Sung y ministro de Educacion Superior del Comite de Educacion, Pak Kun Gwang, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC, el vicecanciller Kim Hyong Jun y otros funcionarios coreanos.
					
					En su discurso de la ocasion, el embajador palestino dijo que las relaciones de amistad preparadas por Su Excelencia Yasser Arafat y el Presidente Kim Il Sung se desarrollan cada dia mas bajo la atencion de Su Excelencia Mahmoud Abbas y el Mariscal Kim Jong Un.
					
					Expreso la conviccion de que bajo la direccion del Mariscal, el PTC lograra mayores exitos en la construccion de un Estado prospero y el cumplimiento de la causa de reunificacion.
					
					Le siguio en usar la palabra Kang Sok Ju quien destaco que consolidar y desarrollar invariablemente las tradicionales relaciones de amistad entre los dos paises, preparadas por el Presidente y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il junto con Su Excelencia Yasser Arafat, son la firme posicion del PTC y el gobierno de la RPDC.
					
					Agrego que en el futuro tambien, la RPDC enviara el apoyo total y solidaridad a la justa causa del gobierno y el pueblo de Palestina para rescatar los derechos nacionales legitimos como fundar un Estado independiente con Kuds oriental como capital.

articles.title: Encuentro de amistad de juventud Corea-China
articles.content:
Encuentro de amistad de juventud Corea-China
Dalian, 17 de octubre (Corresponsal de ACNC) -- Tuvo lugar el dia 17 en un ambiente amistoso el encuentro de amistad de la juventud Corea-China en la Universidad de Tecnologia de Dalian.
					Asistieron los miembros de la delegacion juvenil de amistad de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea encabezada por el presidente del Comite Central de la Union de la Juventud Socialista Kim Il Sung, Jon Yong Nam, de visita en China, y los profesores, empleados y estudiantes del plantel docente chino mencionado. 
					
					En la ocasion hubo discursos. 
					
					Los oradores dijeron que las relaciones de amistad y cooperacion entre la RPDC y China, preparadas por el Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il junto con los revolucionarios chinos de veterana generacion, tienen larga historia y tradiciones. 
					
					Mencionaron que bajo la profunda atencion de los maximos dirigentes de ambos paises, se hacen cada dia mas solidos y activos la amistad y el intercambio entre los jovenes de los dos paises. 
					
					La juventud es la flor del pais y nacion y protagonista del futuro, afirmaron y expusieron la conviccion de que la tradicional amistad Corea-China se fortalecera mas por los esfuerzos conjuntos de los jovenes de los dos paises. 
					
					Luego, se ofrecio una funcion del grupo central de propaganda artistica juvenil coreana y de los artistas jovenes chinos. 
					
					Los artistas coreanos iniciaron la funcion con el inmortal himno revolucionario "Cancion del General Kim Il Sung" y presentaron en la escena el solo femenino "Pensamiento en el General", la danza con zango (tambor coreano), el concierto instrumental "Juventud es tren expreso", el coro mixto "Nuestro dirigente adorado por el pueblo" y las canciones chinas, dejando profunda impresion a los espectadores.
					
					Los artistas chinos pusieron el solo femenino "Hermosa tierra natal", la danza coreana "Campanula" y otras piezas.
